/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a canopy of greenery over the urban landscape. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with white clouds, providing a serene backdrop to the busy street below.
